item.title: After Transmigrating, I Married the Male Lead’s Sister (GL)
item.description: Synopsis: Li Suimei knew that Qin Qing would disdain to attend her engagement ceremony with Qin Zhan. After all, as a vicious female supporting character, Li Suimei’s role as a stepping stone for the male and female leads was almost over. Why would Qin Qing come to help her? Li Suimei chuckled bitterly. She had heard rumors about Qin Qing being very protective of her loved ones, but she didn't know who had spread those rumors. ——At the engagement ceremony, Qin Qing, who was originally not supposed to attend, suddenly appeared. Wearing a snow-white wedding dress, she stood in the position that should have belonged to the male protagonist and said expressionlessly, "Now, you are my wife." Li Suimei: "..." Didn't this person seem indifferent towards her just yesterday? •••• Small Theater: Qin Qing pinched Li Suimei's wrist, her gaze fierce, "Back then, I always thought, you invited me to dinner and movies, stayed up late with me to go through documents, hugged my arm and cried, calling me 'sister.' Whenever I got angry, you would get nervous, and you even walked in and out of my room in your pajamas. If that wasn't love, what was it?" Li Suimei looked confused, "When did I bent?" Qin Qing: "..."

item.title: The Second Son of The Marquis Runs Away from Home ~ Lacking Talent, He Abandons Everything and Becomes an Adventurer ~
item.description: "I can't take it anymore..." Constantly compared to his prodigious elder brother, who is hailed as a genius, Serk strives relentlessly to earn recognition. However, unable to bear it any longer, Serk reaches his breaking point and runs away not only from home but from the country itself. He becomes an adventurer in the land he escapes to, but...

item.title: The Goddess Granted Me the [Hatching] Skill and Somehow I Became the Strongest Tamer, Commanding Mythical and Divine Beasts
item.description: Klaus, who was on the verge of death due to a high fever, met a goddess and was specially granted the ‘Hatching’ skill. When he regained consciousness, he found himself lying in bed surrounded by his parents and his younger sister, Celia. Later, after various events, Klaus became an adventurer and discovered a large egg deep in the forest. When he hatched it, a phoenix emerged. For some reason, a familiar contract was automatically formed, along with the bonus of being able to use some of the familiar's abilities. As Klaus fully manifested the true power of ‘Hatching’, he gradually began to attract attention among adventurers and eventually caught the eye of the nation...

item.title: After Retirement, Living a Stud Life in Another World
item.description: After drinking too much at my retirement celebration, I woke up to find myself inexplicably transformed into a beautiful young boy in another world. In this world where magic reigns supreme, there's a catch – only women can use magic. The value of men lies in their ability to produce magically powerful offspring, recognized only through the demanding role of a 'stud' in a challenging setting. Somehow, when I engage in procreation, both the children and their mothers gain peculiar powers. Before I knew it, my surroundings were filled with women. Is this some kind of cheat?

item.title: Global Descent to Sky Islands: Getting a God-level Talent from the Start
item.description: All humanity from Blue Star descended into a world without land, where the sky is filled with floating islands. Everyone must choose a class, start anew here, and strive to survive! Starting with a small, broken piece of land, to survive, one must land on these mysterious islands, search for resources, expand their territory, and then build their own sky island. Upon entering the game, Han Xing unexpectedly activated a unique hidden SSS Grade talent, ‘God-level Craftsman’. He never fails in crafting anything; everything he crafts turns from tr*sh to legendary. [Successfully Crafted a Blunt Wooden Stick, Quality – Legendary, Property: Never breaks, with a 100% Stun effect.] [Successfully Crafted a Rusted Iron Sword, Quality – Epic, Property: Break any defenses, with a 100% Tetan*s effect.] …… As the survivors step out to explore the outside world, mysteries begin to surface. Lost civilizations, the shattered truths of the world… When a terrifying natural disaster strikes, hundreds of millions of survivors gaze at the huge island in the sky, covered with Mythical-grade engineering tools, and almost simultaneously exclaim, “Look, that’s the man who withstands the calamity!”

item.title: Global Descent to Sky Islands: Getting a God-level Talent from the Start
item.description: All humanity from Blue Star descended into a world without land, where the sky is filled with floating islands. Everyone must choose a class, start anew here, and strive to survive! Starting with a small, broken piece of land, to survive, one must land on these mysterious islands, search for resources, expand their territory, and then build their own sky island. item.title: The Foolish General's Mute Spouse
item.description: General Qi Ren, known as the "Mad Wolf" was once an undefeated war god. However, he was poisoned by an enemy spy on the battlefield, which left him mentally impaired, leading to the tragic downfall of a legendary hero. The Emperor, relieved to have neutralized this formidable threat to his throne, felt a twinge of guilt. Hearing rumors that the "madman" harbored affection for the timid and mute Seventh Prince, Fu Yu'an, the Emperor decided to arrange their marriage, believing it to be a benevolent gesture. However, after the wedding, Fu Yu'an, who had to play both father and mother to the seemingly foolish general, was shocked when he saw the "madman" climbing into his bed with clear, calculating eyes. Fu Yu'an kicked him off and exclaimed, "You're not a fool?" To which Qi Ren retorted, "And you're not mute, are you? We're both hiding our true selves—so why the disdain?" "...”

item.title: I Have been Reincarnated As a Lazy, Arrogant Noble, but When I Destroyed The Scenario Through Effort, I Became The Most Powerful With Extraordinary Magical Power
item.description: "Weiss Fancent" A debased villainous noble with an arrogant attitude, embodying true evil. Before I realized it, I had been reincarnated as that man. This despicable scumbag, who despised effort and was beyond redemption, would eventually become a minion of the Demon Lord and be deceived, only to be executed. "Noblesse Oblige." This is the aristocratic academy game that I love. But... "I'll shatter that kind of scenario." I will alter the path of destruction. As I started making efforts, with the help of those around me, my stats began to rise, and I enrolled in the academy, the stage of this story. However, it is there that I realize. "Am I... too strong?" This is the story of a man reincarnated as a lazy noble, who breaks the scenario through relentless effort and becomes the most formidable.

item.title: A Moment Too Late (GL)
item.nameextend: ***I have a feeling she's just your type***
item.description: Synopsis: 【Chasing Wife Crematorium】 In her youth, Shu Yubai fell in love with a girl. She confessed to her, and the girl, rather conflicted, said: "Don't be like this, we still need to be friends." When they grew up, Shu Yubai, who had been friends with the girl for many years, decided to give up on her and find someone else. As a result-- During a blind date: The blind date partner whispered, "The girl at the next table has been staring at us. What's her deal?" During a date: "Xiao Shu, don't you feel like there's a girl secretly following us?" While booking a room: Shu Yubai held the room card to open the door and found the girl who claimed to be her lifelong friend curled up on the bed in a slip dress, her clear black and white eyes quietly looking at her... #Pretending to be straight is fun for a while, chasing a wife is a crematorium.

item.title: Quick Transmigration: The Villain Is Too Pampered and Alluring
item.nameextend: ***The Fake Daughter Will Not Be a Cannon Fodder 021***
item.description:
To survive, Sheng Nuan must traverse different worlds, playing the role of self-destructive cannon fodder while saving the darkest villains. These villains are cold-blooded, obsessive, and ruthless—capable of annihilating millions with a smile and destroying the world with a wave of their hand. Holding the cannon fodder's script, Sheng Nuan is terrified... Later: A paranoid young man with a gloomy expression: "Nuan Nuan, you're not allowed to go anywhere except by my side..." The cold-blooded emperor whose face was stained with blood: "Nuan Nuan, for you, what does it matter if the empire falls?" The demonized immortal with snow-white hair: "Nuan Nuan, you are my inner demon." The zombie king of the apocalypse with an unwavering gaze: "Nuan Nuan, it’s your choice—kill me, or save me." Sheng Nuan became even more panicked...

item.title: Don't Provoke the Black Lotus O [Transmigration Novel]
item.description: A light-hearted, humorous, face-slapping, satisfying read. A quirky and clever Alpha × a cold, black lotus Omega. Jiang Ci transmigrated into the role of a cannon-fodder villain in an ancient ABO novel. The original body, a prestigious first-rank military marquis with illustrious battle achievements, married the female lead out of lust for her beauty. After marriage, his true nature was revealed: he imprisoned and abused her, and as a womanizer, he filled his courtyard with concubines, favoring them over his wife... In the end, he was mutilated by the blackened princess, who removed his gland, severed his limbs, and locked him in a pitch-dark dungeon. When Jiang Ci transmigrated, she found herself straddling the female lead, engaged in unspeakable acts. Jiang Ci immediately revealed her true self: "I'm not Gao Yi! I won't take the blame for this! I can even prove it by breakdancing!" Female lead: "???" The system issued a task: "Please fix the messed-up plot, torment the female lead, and promote her descent into darkness." Jiang Ci: "No time for you." System: "???" … Jiang Ci had been single for over twenty years and had only ever liked one fictional character. Now that she had transmigrated into her lord, how could she not seize this heaven-sent opportunity? No matter who you are, she would confront heaven and earth, and teach a lesson to anyone who bullied the female lead! After all, she had become the villain—it would be a shame not to act domineering and arrogant! She gave her all to the female lead, protecting her at every turn, helping her build her career, and imparting all her skills... Only to eventually realize that she was just a substitute, that the female lead had always harbored a white moonlight in her heart. All the ambiguity between them was because she resembled that person. Jiang Ci: "Can I know who she is?" Female lead: "No." Jiang Ci was finally numb. Heartbroken and disillusioned, she exchanged rewards with the system and returned to her original world. … Later, the woman who had ascended to the pinnacle of power got drunk at a palace banquet. "Have you found her?" Maid: "Your Highness has forgotten, she was a soul transmigrator, not belonging to this world. We don't even know her real name." The wine cup fell to the ground, and the woman's eyes dimmed. … When Jiang Ci woke up again, she found herself still in the novel, but now she had transmigrated into her own body, and ten years had passed. The young girl she once needed to protect had now become the powerful and influential Grand Princess. It was said that this Grand Princess was cold and aloof, with her only peculiar hobby being to capture those with eccentric personalities and suspected of having delusions. Jiang Ci wanted nothing to do with the Grand Princess this time and tried her best to keep her identity hidden. However, the Grand Princess, after ten years, had thoroughly studied all of Jiang Ci's tactics, surpassing her teacher and excelling even further. #Toshootoneselfinthefoot# #Dugherowngrave# Reading Guide: 1. Happy ending (HE), no change in CP, both characters are pure. 2. Ancient ABO setting: Alpha (A) = Qianjun, Omega (O) = Kunjun, Beta (B) = Zhongjun. 3. Heavy use of private settings, the entire story is fictional.

item.title: The Eunuch Has A Wife
item.description: Bai Zhi is an eunuch—a fake eunuch. In her past life, the empress bestowed upon her a wife, the princess of a fallen kingdom. However, when the crown prince attempted to assault her wife, he was killed in self-defense. In the end, the fake eunuch and the princess of the fallen kingdom met their fate by being beheaded in public, their lives filled with humiliation and absurdity. When Bai Zhi opened her eyes again, she found herself reborn one year earlier, when the beautiful and tragic princess of the fallen kingdom had just been tied up and thrown onto her bed. This time, she only wanted to survive, but as she tried to leave, she was stopped. The princess, with teary eyes, clutched her sleeve and asked, "Husband, won’t you take me with you?" Bai Zhi replied, "From now on, I can only live a hard life of farming. You should find your own way." Princess: "I am willing to accompany you in a life of men plowing and women weaving." Bai Zhi: "..." But I am a woman!

item.title: "On the Day of Reunion, The Heir to the Wealthy Family Became My Brother"
item.nameextend: ***"Does your boyfriend know that you slept with me?"***
item.description: At a party, during a game of Truth or Dare, Ning Xin‘er chose Dare. She scanned the room and locked eyes on the most handsome guy in the booth. Boldly, she walked over and lightly said, "Hey handsome, can you do me a favor and give me a kiss?" Her first act of boldness in life resulted in the man's relentless pursuit: "You kissed me; now you must take responsibility." Thus, Ning Xin’er's first romance as an adult began, by accident…

item.title: After Transmigrating, I and the Female Lead Both Found It 'Really Fragrant' (GL)
item.description: Synopsis: Shen Qiqi, a prolific author of female-led novels, was known for her love of torturing the female leads in her stories. She would make the female leads suffer, become isolated, and ultimately turn to the dark side before making a triumphant return. Never in her wildest dreams did she imagine she would be transported into one of her own novels, turning into a mediocre and vicious cannon fodder—a junior sister who delighted in bullying the female lead and was eventually hung on the city wall as punishment. To survive, she decided to become a carefree and laid-back player, knowing and daring nothing. However, upon seeing the female lead for the first time, she instantly fell head over heels. To shower the female lead with love and warmth, Shen Qiqi went out of her way to protect her: * When the female lead was bullied by other vicious cannon fodder, she was the first to help her fight back. * When the female lead was wronged, she felt heartbroken. * When the female lead was pursued by a scumbag, she... broke them up! Meanwhile, Liu Shuang had been reborn with a cold heart, viewing everyone around her as insignificant ants. Fortunately, she still possessed the magic from her previous life. In this new life, everything remained unchanged except for her once arrogant and overbearing junior sister, who now revolved around her, showering her with flattery and affection. Using her mind-reading ability, she overheard the junior sister's thoughts: "OMG, the female lead is so beautiful! I can do this!" "My senior sister is kind, gentle, and understanding. No one can hurt her!" "Senior sister, don't be so saintly. You'll be bullied by bad people!" The Demon Lord Liu Shuang: ??? I'd rather jump off a building than believe Shen Qiqi again! ... My junior sister is so cute, I'm so into her. A carefree, optimistic, appearance-obsessed salted fish vs. a cold-on-the-outside-but-warm-on-the-inside, beautiful and powerful Demon Lord 1v1 HE, light-hearted and sweet

item.title: Sweet Kiss
item.nameextend: ***"Li Yansui is indeed a very good person."***
item.description: In the bustling city of Qinghui, Hengshan First High School is welcoming new students. Among them, Bai Tingzhou stands out for his remarkable achievements in the National High School Math Competition, which earns him a lot of attention. He was known as the "untouchable treasure" of Hengshan First High School and a favorite of the guidance director. He could only be admired from afar; many people tried to add him on WeChat but found that they couldn't even find his account. Meanwhile, the third-year students are stressed about their upcoming class placement exams. Xu Mu brings news of a new, beautiful transfer student, Li Yansui, who wants to join their top science class. This news stirs curiosity and excitement among the students, though Bai Tingzhou and his friend Qi Jinyang remain uninterested. A playful confrontation between Qi Jinyang and Bai Tingzhou is interrupted by the arrival of Mr. Wang and Li Yansui, who surprise Bai Tingzhou by revealing their past acquaintance.

item.title: The White Moonlight Disdained by the Male Protagonist of Redemption
item.nameextend: ***"Feng Jingzhuo is Inherently Cold and Ruthless"***
item.description: Ning Yao died tragically. The man she had saved and cared for for many years despised her and shattered her spirit veins with his own hands and dissolved her body. Ning Yao: “Thank you. I have waited for this day.” 　 Ning Yao is from the ancient Bodhi clan, kind by nature but without a heart. One year, she rescued a demon from the hands of the immortal Xuanmen, who was tortured and dying. She took good care of him, curing his years of illness and scars. She did not mind his humble status and liked him wholeheartedly, always smiling, hugging, and kissing him. Every time at that moment, Feng Jingzhuo felt pity and helplessness, and his love deepened. Little Bodhi (Ning Yao) cured his disabled and ugly body and cured his inferiority, self-loathing, sensitivity, and paranoia. How could he not be infatuated and loyal and love her deeply? But what Feng Jingzhuo did not know was that according to the rules of the Bodhi clan's ascension, one must first save others to prove the truth and then die and be reborn before ascending. And Ning Yao's lifelong wish is to ascend. 　　 That year, the eldest sister failed to ascend to heaven, and before she and her brother-in-law retired to the world sweetly, she pointed out a clear path for Ning Yao: “Yao Yao, our Bodhi clan is too beloved. Who could bear to use us as a stepping stone for enlightenment?” “If you’re truly set on it, why not try that demon imprisoned by the immortal sect? Pfft—those fools don’t know his worth. He’s from the Cangyuan Dragon Clan.” “If it works, great. If not… well, you could always fall in love, just like I did.” Her elder sister revealed a secret about the Cangyuan Dragon Clan: If they fall deeply enough in love, their hearts will grow scales to shield them from their emotions. When that happens, their instincts will turn against their beloved, giving rise to an uncontrollable urge to kill. Slay one’s beloved, attain enlightenment, ascend immediately, and forget the past. A perfect outcome for both. Ning Yao knew that Feng Jingzhuo had already begun to grow his heart’s scales. Yet, he endured the agonizing pain, hiding away to claw open his own chest. He ripped out the endlessly growing scales, pinned his own hands down with bone nails—desperately resisting his dragon instincts. “Yao Yao, don’t come in…” “I beg you… whatever you do, don’t come in…” “It’ll be over soon. Be good. Stay outside…” Outside, Ning Yao pondered, if we can both ascend, that’s better than neither of us ascending at all. So, she went in. Just as she always did, she held him in her arms, kissing his trembling, pale lips with tenderness. After many 10 thousand years, Ning Yao was reborn and successfully ascended. She forgot Feng Jingzhou, but he remembered her. Tormenting himself, he wanted to turn back time. Ning Yao was very happy, but the ceremony of conferring the gods was a little simple. Because the entire world of gods was busy trying to stop a fallen god who wants to activate the forbidden Time-Reversal Array.　　 　　 Theme: My heart is controlled by me, not by heavens.

item.title: Dare to Cancel the Engagement? I Will Marry Your Ancestor!
item.nameextend: ***Everyone is Happy; That's the Real Happiness***
item.description: Mo Ling is transmigrated into another world and unexpectedly becomes a sect master. However, things don't go as planned when Long Ziyan publicly breaks off their engagement, putting Mo Ling in a difficult position. The Long family had originally fled to Beihan Prefecture and survived under the original Mo Ling's protection, only to betray him later, causing his death. This allows Mo Ling to take over the body. Facing internal and external challenges, Mo Ling finds himself at a critical juncture...

item.title: It Was A Fake Marriage, But Jiu Qian Sui Took It Seriously
item.description: OVERVIEW:   In her past life, Shen Qing Li married her cousin Jiang Zhi Li with a huge dowry left by her father. She thought her new family was kind, but they were all wolves in disguise, just wanting to take her family's wealth. She not only helped her husband raise the son of his mistress, but the mistress openly moved into their home, took over her position, and even mistreated her child. In the end, both she and her child met a tragic end. In this life, Shen Qing Li firmly broke off the engagement with Jiang Zhi Li and decided to leave with her mother. However, her maternal family set up something unexpected.

item.title: Commoner Queen: Falling in Love with His Royal Highness the Crown Prince
item.description: The betrayal of her boyfriend and sister made her commit suicide by jumping into a lake. Unexpectedly, she traveled to another world, and her soul was attached to a woman named Murong Ziying. People said that body was unlucky for her husband, but so what? She is her, and I am me. No one can stop her from loving His Royal Highness.

item.title: The Heroic Tale of the Weakest Ability User ~The F-Ranker with the Dual Pistols~
item.description: In this world, there exist beings known as "Ability Users." However, in such a world, a boy named Task was judged to have no abilities and was branded as a failure—an F-Rank. At the academy that trains Ability Users, he was the lowest of the low, the only student unable to participate in combat training. But one day, he was noticed by the legendary and most powerful mentor, Ken Misaki, who, despite being an "ability-less" master, recognized Task’s talent for combat techniques. As a result, Task was given the chance to participate in the academy’s prestigious "Rank Festival." As he fights his way up from the very bottom, Task begins to awaken his hidden potential and steadily rises to become the academy’s strongest warrior. —"I'm not just dreaming of greatness—I'm going to become it!!"

item.title: After Rebirth, I Married my Archenemy
item.volume: Volume 2: A Blade Drawn on the Bowstring
item.description:
Before her death, Qun Qing hated the powerful official Lu Huating the most. She hated him for assisting the new emperor and for being cunning and insidious. She thought about him day and night, and tried her best to defeat him, but she was not his match. In the end, she became a cannon fodder in his hands. After Qun Qing died, she saw the princess of the fallen country that she had protected with her life, crying and leaning on the new emperor's chest: "Qung Qing is dead, what should I do?" The new emperor kissed her: "You will be fine, just love me." The princess burst into tears, like a delicate flower under the rain: "Qung Qing is dead, Your Majesty is all I have left." When she opened his eyes, Qun Qing had woke up three years ago. She stood up, woodenly packed her bags, and regardless of the princess's obstruction, took off her jade crown and walked away, dropped her female official's wooden seal, turned around and left, leaving behind ten years of careful planning and treading on thin ice. Restore the country? Pfft, restore it my foot. ------ The powerful minister Lu Huating is deeply cunning, ruthless, and dominates the power struggles of the court. Tired of the ugly nature of human hearts, his life has become dull and unfulfilling. Looking back on his life, the only thing that left an impression was a female officer, a spy, whom he poisoned to death at the age of twenty-six. For the love of the princess, she sacrificed his life for the country and schemed against him several times. In the end, she knelt in front of the Summer Palace, her facial expression remaining unchanged, with a look of resentment in her eyes, and sighed with a smile, "The king who wins is the ruler, and the one who loses is the defeated," before raising her head and drinking to the last drop. Blood poured from her lips, a thin layer of vivid red. When he opened his eyes again, Lu Huating returned to his twenty-three-year-old self. Lu Huating looked at the documents under his command, and felt even more bored. He put down his brush and leaned on the back of the chair: "Where is the female official accompanying Crown Princess?" "... She resigned. She asked me to tell My lord that she would not fight anymore." Lu Huating was silent for a while, and curled his lips coldly: "She said she won't fight, so the fight is over?"

item.title: The Tyrant's Happy Ending
item.description: BL fantasy novel set in a Western-style Omegaverse. It follows the story of Lyle Beltimore, a duke who rises to power after being betrayed by his first love, Yernen Helio, a prince who later becomes a tyrant. Lyle returns to the capital after years of war and finds Yernen dead. However, Yernen reincarnates into the body of Prince Fortnum, Lyle’s new fiancé, and must now navigate his second life, torn between his past regrets and the possibility of a new future with Lyle. Themes of love, betrayal, revenge, and redemption are central to the plot, with intense emotional struggles and a chance at a happy ending in Yernen’s second life.

item.title: Transmigrated into the Villain's Cannon Fodder Ex-Wife (Transmigrated into a Book)
item.description:
Lin Chu, an engineering student, was following a novel and found the villain character especially compelling. When she read the part where the villain was forced to marry a manipulative woman during his downfall, Lin Chu couldn’t help but criticize the green tea character. Who would have expected that she’d black out, only to become that very same troublesome woman who regretted her marriage to the villain on their wedding day and ultimately got herself killed? Lin Chu: “…” Stay calm, don’t panic. Looking at the villainous husband, injured and returning from the battlefield, Lin Chu thought she had found her chance to escape her tragic fate by clinging to his leg for survival…
If you’re enjoying the story, please consider:
  1. Supporting the author

item.title: Giving Interstellar Players a Horror Ghost Game Shock
item.description:
Ye Yuxi has lived in the interstellar world for 20 years and has just remembered that she is a proud transmigrator. Before her transmigration, she was an avid fan of horror games; after transmigrating, she coincidentally became a university student majoring in game design. In this interstellar world, where everyone is a tough, bloodthirsty warrior, violent and gory games are all the rage—most notably, games about hunting insectoid aliens and zombies. A search across the star network reveals no concept of supernatural horror games at all! What does this mean? It means there is a vast untapped blue ocean of opportunity! With this in mind, Ye Yuxi rolls up her sleeves and decides to give the interstellar residents a little shock with horror female ghost! She launches Campus Nightmare, and interstellar players are terrified: “I’ve never been this scared of school!” She releases Residential Area Battle Royale, and interstellar players cry: “This isn’t the battle royale I’ve played before!” She rolls out A Loving Home, and interstellar players go crazy: “Where’s my quilt barrier? Is there any safe place in this world?!” Later, after receiving the 10,086th complaint message from a terrified player, Ye Yuxi calmly accepts an interview: “At first, I just wanted to make a small game I’d enjoy. I never expected it to be so popular, so I ended up making a few more…” Players who were scared out of their wits: “We thank you!”

item.title: Quick Transmigration: The Villain Is Too Pampered and Alluring
item.nameextend: ***The Fake Daughter Will Not Be a Cannon Fodder 019***
item.description:
To survive, Sheng Nuan must traverse different worlds, playing the role of self-destructive cannon fodder while saving the darkest villains. These villains are cold-blooded, obsessive, and ruthless—capable of annihilating millions with a smile and destroying the world with a wave of their hand. Holding the cannon fodder's script, Sheng Nuan is terrified... Later: A paranoid young man with a gloomy expression: "Nuan Nuan, you're not allowed to go anywhere except by my side..." The cold-blooded emperor whose face was stained with blood: "Nuan Nuan, for you, what does it matter if the empire falls?" The demonized immortal with snow-white hair: "Nuan Nuan, you are my inner demon." The zombie king of the apocalypse with an unwavering gaze: "Nuan Nuan, it’s your choice—kill me, or save me." Sheng Nuan became even more panicked...

item.title: The Story of How I Pretended To Be A Boy and Ended Up Being Loved By A Mafia Boss
item.description: Anis lives in the slums with her mother. From morning until night, she makes a living by shining shoes in the noble district. One of her regular customers, Ryu, sometimes shows up without warning. Chatting with him has become Anis’s only joy in her otherwise boring days. “I wonder when I’ll see him again…” she thinks as she keeps polishing leather shoes. It’s been five years since she first met Ryu, and Anis is now eighteen.   She thought their relationship — just a shoe-shining girl and a regular customer — would stay the same forever… But when Anis steps into the nightlife for the first time, she starts to see a new side of Ryu, one she never noticed before. Slowly, their relationship begins to change. And then, meeting a certain person starts to change Anis’s life in a big way…?!

item.title: The Young Male Protagonist Who is Destined for Ruin Fell for Me
item.description: The man I had a drunken one-night stand with turned out to be the male lead from the original story. The issue? This ridiculously rich, handsome, and incredibly fit younger guy is set to start a war in two years. And me? I need to get out of here, obviously. So, I said, "I only liked you for your money." "Is that so? I have plenty of money. Does that mean you like me a lot, then?" He leaned in, planting a light kiss on my cheek, then asked in a low voice, "Besides the money, what else do you like about me? Yesterday, it seemed like you were quite into my face and body too." "What?" "I'm guessing you’re in love with me..." "Ack!" Instinctively, I screamed to block his love confession. But Kyle, as if he'd just realized something, grinned brightly. "I get it now, noona. You don’t want to hear me say I love you, right?" Exactly, that’s it! "In that case, I’ll express it in a way you like better than words." With that, Kyle tugged his tie loose and stepped closer to me. No! I don't want you to express it with your body either!

item.title: The Second Son of The Marquis Runs Away from Home ~ Lacking Talent, He Abandons Everything and Becomes an Adventurer ~
item.description: "I can't take it anymore..." Constantly compared to his prodigious elder brother, who is hailed as a genius, Serk strives relentlessly to earn recognition. However, unable to bear it any longer, Serk reaches his breaking point and runs away not only from home but from the country itself. He becomes an adventurer in the land he escapes to, but...

item.title: The Goddess Granted Me the [Hatching] Skill and Somehow I Became the Strongest Tamer, Commanding Mythical and Divine Beasts
item.description: Klaus, who was on the verge of death due to a high fever, met a goddess and was specially granted the ‘Hatching’ skill. When he regained consciousness, he found himself lying in bed surrounded by his parents and his younger sister, Celia. Later, after various events, Klaus became an adventurer and discovered a large egg deep in the forest. When he hatched it, a phoenix emerged. For some reason, a familiar contract was automatically formed, along with the bonus of being able to use some of the familiar's abilities. As Klaus fully manifested the true power of ‘Hatching’, he gradually began to attract attention among adventurers and eventually caught the eye of the nation...

item.title: After Retirement, Living a Stud Life in Another World
item.description: After drinking too much at my retirement celebration, I woke up to find myself inexplicably transformed into a beautiful young boy in another world. In this world where magic reigns supreme, there's a catch – only women can use magic. The value of men lies in their ability to produce magically powerful offspring, recognized only through the demanding role of a 'stud' in a challenging setting. Somehow, when I engage in procreation, both the children and their mothers gain peculiar powers. Before I knew it, my surroundings were filled with women. Is this some kind of cheat?

item.title: The Young Marquis Regrets Too Late
item.description: Jiang Jingchun, who was the cherished daughter of a minister’s household, grew up as a true pampered young miss. She could have whatever she desired, except for one thing: her cousin, Gu Huaisheng, the young marquis of a marquis’ residence. Gu Huaisheng, who was the son of a marquis’ household, was like snow on the eaves or the moon outside the window—elegant, untouchable, and the most outstanding young man in his family. He was far beyond anyone’s reach. Jiang Jingchun tried everything to win his favour. She found out the type of person he seemed to admire and transformed herself from an outspoken and willful young lady into someone obedient and meek in his presence. Yet no matter how hard she tried, Gu Huaisheng would barely spare her a glance. The frustrated and desperate Jiang Jingchun followed a terrible idea from her closest friend. One day, while he wasn’t paying attention, she leaned in to kiss his cheek. But just as she moved closer, Gu Huaisheng turned his head, and their lips accidentally met… The soft touch of their lips startled her, but before Jiang Jingchun could even blush, Gu Huaisheng shoved her away harshly. With a cold and angry glare, he spat, “Shameless,” and strode away without a backward glance. That one push left Jiang Jingchun completely stunned and shattered her girlish infatuation into pieces. <hr /> Misfortunes never come singly. On the same day, news arrived at the minister’s household: the true daughter of their family had been found. Jiang Jingchun had lived as the family’s treasured daughter for over a decade. Only then did she learn that she was, in fact, a fake daughter. At the true daughter’s formal recognition banquet, Jiang Jingchun witnessed something that cut deeper than anything before. Gu Huaisheng, who had always been cold and distant to her, now stood before the true daughter and treated her gently and warmly. He could smile, she realised, but not for her. From beginning to end, she had been nothing but a colossal joke. Gu Huaisheng was cruel. She swore she would never like him again. <hr /> After the true daughter of the Jiang family returned, Jiang Jingchun’s heart turned to ashes. She calmly accepted the marriage that the Jiang family arranged for her. But before the betrothal was finalised, Gu Huaisheng appeared at her family residence’s doorstep. On a day of heavy rain, he stood in the downpour under an umbrella, gripping her delicate wrist and refusing to let go. He said, “He is not a good man.” Jiang Jingchun laughed and shook off his hand. “He is still far kinder than you, Cousin.” Under Jiang Jingchun’s icy gaze, Gu Huaisheng tensed up. A sharp ache spread through his chest. For the first time, the proud and aloof young marquis understood what it truly meant to feel regret.

item.title: The Foolish General's Mute Spouse
item.description: General Qi Ren, known as the "Mad Wolf" was once an undefeated war god. However, he was poisoned by an enemy spy on the battlefield, which left him mentally impaired, leading to the tragic downfall of a legendary hero. The Emperor, relieved to have neutralized this formidable threat to his throne, felt a twinge of guilt. Hearing rumors that the "madman" harbored affection for the timid and mute Seventh Prince, Fu Yu'an, the Emperor decided to arrange their marriage, believing it to be a benevolent gesture. However, after the wedding, Fu Yu'an, who had to play both father and mother to the seemingly foolish general, was shocked when he saw the "madman" climbing into his bed with clear, calculating eyes. Fu Yu'an kicked him off and exclaimed, "You're not a fool?" To which Qi Ren retorted, "And you're not mute, are you? We're both hiding our true selves—so why the disdain?" "...”

item.title: I Have been Reincarnated As a Lazy, Arrogant Noble, but When I Destroyed The Scenario Through Effort, I Became The Most Powerful With Extraordinary Magical Power
item.description: "Weiss Fancent" A debased villainous noble with an arrogant attitude, embodying true evil. Before I realized it, I had been reincarnated as that man. This despicable scumbag, who despised effort and was beyond redemption, would eventually become a minion of the Demon Lord and be deceived, only to be executed. "Noblesse Oblige." This is the aristocratic academy game that I love. But... "I'll shatter that kind of scenario." I will alter the path of destruction. As I started making efforts, with the help of those around me, my stats began to rise, and I enrolled in the academy, the stage of this story. However, it is there that I realize. "Am I... too strong?" This is the story of a man reincarnated as a lazy noble, who breaks the scenario through relentless effort and becomes the most formidable.

item.title: The Female Lead is Looking at Me Differently (GL)
item.description: Synopsis: Wen Zhao transmigrated into a low-magic Xianxia novel, only to discover she'd become the cannon fodder second female lead who bullied the female lead, seduced the male lead, and was generally a green tea b*tch, lotus-flower-like antagonist. In the original novel, she was the catalyst for misunderstandings between the male and female leads, a dedicated tool character who lived until the grand finale. In the end, the male and female leads ended up together, while she suffered the consequences. To avoid a bad ending, Wen Zhao tried her best to cling to the female lead without being too out of character, hoping to safely exit the story. Although she was still being required by the system to perform actions befitting a second female lead, Wen Zhao believed the female lead would eventually understand her sincere heart! However, it seemed like the female lead was looking at her a bit strangely? •••• Male Lead: A Zhao, I suddenly realized that I might actually like you a little. Wen Zhao: ??? She thought this was the biggest deviation from the plot, but then the female lead slowly approached. Lowering her gaze slightly, the female lead, whose gaze was usually cold, revealed a hint of obsession and possessiveness. She walked up to Wen Zhao and smiled softly. She asked softly, "A Zhao, between him and me, who do you choose?" Wen Zhao: I choose you! I choose you! •••• One-Sentence Summary: Thank you everyone, I'm with the female lead now. Theme: Even when facing difficulties, one should strive to overcome them and have the determination to reverse their situation. Only through hard work can one achieve success. Victory and new surprises are waiting not far away.

item.title: Mistakenly Treated The Princess As A Concubine
item.description: After the daughter of the former mistress of the Jing'an Marquis's residence, Wen Zhuojin, fell from grace and lost all support after her uncle's family declined, the engagement with the heir of the Rongguo Duke's residence was snatched away by her stepsister. After the broken engagement, rumors spread that Wen Zhuojin, who was said to be in mourning at home, disguised herself and went to a brothel in the western market of Yun Jing City. There, she bought the freedom of a young courtesan, taking her in and treating her like a precious jewel at a house she had prepared for her outside. The world believed that the engagement had been stolen from Wen Zhuojin, but in fact, it was a marriage she had long wanted to cancel. This was because Wen Zhuojin did not like men; she loved women, especially beautiful, mature women older than herself. The beautiful woman she brought home perfectly met her criteria. To support her lover, Wen Zhuojin worked hard in business, spending more on her lover’s clothes and living expenses than the courtiers in the palace. However, Wen Zhuojin could not openly give her lover a formal title, which made her feel guilty toward her. When she entered the palace to meet with the nobility, hoping to spend a fortune to secure a title for her beloved, Wen Zhuojin came face to face with the current Princess Royal. The Princess Royal wore a hibiscus crown and a black and blue ceremonial robe, holding a dust whisk. Her demeanor was as cold as a snow-capped mountain, exuding aloof elegance and an unworldly air. It was said that at the age of fifteen, the Princess Royal had helped her younger brother ascend the throne, quelled rebellions, subdued neighboring nations, and ruled decisively. She wielded unparalleled power and commanded universal reverence. She was also the woman Wen Zhuojin feared most. While everyone else knelt in respect, Wen Zhuojin stood frozen, trembling, staring in shock at the Princess. Who could tell her why the Princess looked exactly like her delicate and helpless lover sister?! ———— At the age of twenty, Princess Royal Yan Qinglan took her vows as a Taoist nun, swearing never to marry. She never expected that, at twenty-six, she would be poisoned, lose her sight, and be sweetly coaxed by a soft-voiced girl who brought her home. At that time, Yan Qinglan was trapped in a predicament. When she approached the girl, she noticed that the girl’s faint fragrance eased the pain of her poison flare-ups. She decided to follow the girl home to see what she was up to. The girl indeed had intentions for Yan Qinglan—but not the kind Yan Qinglan imagined. Exquisite meals, fine clothes, and extravagant luxury surrounded her. Within days, Princess Yan Qinglan was pampered, becoming even softer and more delicate, her beauty becoming truly unmatched. And all the girl asked for in return was— "Sister, kiss me." "Sister, hug me." "Sister, cuddle me." The sweet voice, with a tone of coquettishness, whispered and enticed her every day. Slowly, Princess Yan Qinglan began to yearn for it. Even after her sight was restored, she continued to be the girl's "concubine" while stirring up the political scene, vying for power and influence. ———— Wen Zhuojin, upon realizing that Princess Yan Qinglan and her beautiful sister were the same person, packed her things and fled overnight. But before she could leave the city gates, she was surrounded by the Imperial Guard. Looking at the woman she once teased to tears and coaxed into embarrassing acts, now brimming with murderous intent, Wen Zhuojin was petrified. “Ah Zhuo, if you leave, who will be my Empress?” Just as Wen Zhuojin thought her life was over, Yan Qinglan suddenly embraced her and whispered in her ear—

item.title: When the Mid-Boss Villainous Noble Recalls Memories of a Past Life and Gains Game Knowledge. I Will Never Accept a Future Where I'm Called the Jealous Earl
item.description: “Release My Fiancé? She's Already My Ex-Fiance!” Kalil Dikaman The young head of the prosperous Dikaman family, known for their advancements in potion research and development. Kalil spends his days tirelessly working on a cure for the disease plaguing his ex-fiancé’s territory. But their relationship is anything but harmonious. Their engagement was arranged by their families—the previous heads—solely to find a cure for the relentless disease. Yet, despite years of effort, the disease remains rampant, and tension festers between them. Determined to earn her acknowledgment, Kalil pushes himself beyond exhaustion, diving headfirst into his research. Until one day These memories...? During one of their rare tea meetings, he notices her disinterested expression and suddenly recalls. I’m the villain? The so-called Jealous Earl?

item.title: Wicked Island Of Ireland
item.description: Lee Su was trapped in a building on a deserted island. She had no memories, no recollection of how she got here. She was rescued by one of the survivors of a plane crash that took place on the island. Hayden Wight. A young gentleman from the United Kingdom. Representative of a security company. Meeting him could have been a blessing, giving her the chance to escape from vicious criminals. From his eyes to his lips and his whole body, the man also seemed to want to give her a chance to start a new life. *** “I don’t know my name or my age. I don’t even know what kinds of danger I am in. That’s why it’s a bit difficult for me to be next to a man.” Lee Seo expressed concern. “I mean, you could also be in danger if you were to get involved with me.” A warm breeze blew in from the sea. As the sand particles began to fly through the air, Hayden covered Lee Su’s face with his hand and replied, “Then I’ll have to receive higher compensation. I don’t intend for you to pay me with your body, so you can rest easy.” Unlike usual, Lee Su could barely control her expression. The memory of last night suddenly came to mind. His blue eyes focused on Lee Seo. “Y-you’re staring at me like a filthy beast.” Lee Su stammered, unable to respond properly. Just then, the question that followed took her breath away. “Who was it that pretended to be asleep and turned me on?” She knew he had seen it all last night.

item.title: The Eldest Legitimate Daughter is Both Beautiful and Valiant (ELDBBV)
item.description:
In the previous life, the Zhenguo Duke’s mansion collapsed and completely vanished. In this lifetime, Bai Qing Yan, the eldest legitimate daughter was reborn and she will never let the Bai family follow the same footsteps than in the previous life.

The sons of the Bai family are already dead, so is there no place for the Bai family to stand in the capital? Xiao Rong Yan, a wealthy businessman from the Wei Kingdom said: “For hundreds of years, the Zhenguo Duke’s Bai family of military lineage, never produced any waste, and the family’s daughters are no exception." Later… the eldest miss of the Bai family was this generation’s goddess of war, legend had it that she had never been defeated. The second miss of the Bai family was the resourceful matriarch at the newly appointed Zhongyong Marquis' mansion. The third miss of the Bai family is this world’s second richest merchant, a talent of the business world who can decide the rains and clouds. Bai Qing Yan was grateful to Xiao Rong Yan for having helped her several times in the previous life, and secretly sent him information several times. On a snowy night, they were blocked outside the city. Xiao Rong Yan: Miss Bai saved me from fire and water again and again, is it that you admire me? Bai Qing Yan said: Young Master Xiao has misunderstood. Xiao Rong Yan: I saved Miss Bai from fire and water again and again, can Miss Bai admire me? Bai Qing Yan: …

item.title: Rebirth of the Excellent Daughter of the Marquis Household (REDMH)
item.description: Gu Yu Qi, a daughter born to a marquis household. She was beautiful with knowledge in both civil and military, and her kindness broader than the sky. It was love at first sight for her, and she insisted on marrying him and was happy even if she were to become a mistress. She worked hard to help him step by step to become the emperor. But what happened to her in the end? For ten whole years, she was humiliated and abandoned. Disheartened, she drank poison to end her life and set her place on fire, only to find herself back to when she was ten years old. It was the year she followed her mother into the capital. It wasn’t too late to change her fate. If Yun Ke had any regrets in his previous life, then it would be how he always kept thinking about a woman who died decades ago. Because of that, before he died, he secretly had the woman’s ashes pressed beneath his coffin. As the emperor, he had the final say of everything under the sky. So how could he allow that woman to be arrogant in front of him? Even at his deathbed, he would crush her beneath him. Who knew he’d be reborn again… When the transmigrated girl meets the boy who was reborn, Gu Yu Qi simply wanted to yell at the sky. Just what are you playing at!?
